episode.title: Staats v. Bristol Laboratories Div. of Bristol-Myers Co.

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: The disposition of 80-264, Staats, the Comptroller General of United States against Bristol Laboratories and by a per curiam opinion filed with the clerk this morning.
The judgment of the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit is affirmed by an equally divided court and Justice Stewart took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
